Functions
LR_fnc_MedicalFacility
Description

Creates an area around _object where players are healed or revived after a time delay.

Arguments
_object

Object the MedicalFacility is created on. <OBJECT>

_length

Length of Area. <SCALAR>

_Width

Width of Area. <SCALAR> _Height- Height of Area. <SCALAR>

Examples
[this] call LR_fnc_MedicalFacility;
[this, 10, 5, 5] call LR_fnc_MedicalFacility;
[MyMedicalBuilding, 10, 5, 5] call LR_fnc_MedicalFacility;

Author: MitchJC
